name: Zombie Shooter (itch) (Jinyue Pang) (Jinyue Pang)
description:
Welcome to the Zombie Shooter Game!

This is a first person adventure that takes place in a town. 

You are playing the role of a hero on the mission to shoot the zombies to protect the last plant.  When the game starts, you will find yourself in the town location on the roof. You need to shoot zombies as much as you can.

You need to aim at the zombie and shoot them before they are closed to the plant. You can change your gun to sniper rifle to see the zombies more clearly. When they attach the plant, you will be end of game. 

The score will be recorded on the screen.

Good luck to you, my hero!

And enjoy the game!

Controls:

Left Click - shooting the zombie

Right Click - change to the sniper rifle

You can also play this game on Mac by this link:

https://jinyue-pang.itch.io/zombie-shooter
